original_text: And when they had brought them to the magistrates, they said, “These men are Jews, and they are disturbing our city.
korean_text: 상관들 앞에 데리고 가서 말하되 이 사람들이 유대인인데 우리 성을 심히 요란하게 하여

sentences.original_text: And when they had brought them to the magistrates,
and they are disturbing our city.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 우리 도시를 어지럽히고 있습니다.
